alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:59AM CST until December 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Slippery Conditions Early this Morning... .Many untreated or secondary roads across the region are slippery as a result of a wintry mix that fell overnight. Freezing drizzle has ended over much of the area, but may linger over central Wisconsin for much of the morning. Slow down and allow plenty of time to reach your destination if driving. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a glaze to under a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Clark and Taylor Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Slippery travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511wi.gov.
